website_summaries.verdict: Electric longboard that offers enhanced stability, comfort, and fun cruising.
pros: A smooth-moving model made of bamboo for supportive riding
Top speed of 10mph with 40-minute battery life
cons: Top speed may not be enough for some

website_summaries.verdict: Heavy-duty electric longboard for fast, lengthy travel.
pros: Boasts high speeds and good control

customer_reviews.title: Good value and support
customer_reviews.text: First I'd like to say it's not waterproof so keep it dry. My daughter has been riding hers for 2 months now and loves it. The battery could last longer but it will go about a mile. I had to call today because the motor broke off. I must say support is very helpful. It could use a better mounting bracket as it's plastic. All in all it's a get what you pay for and how you treat it. No other trouble with it at all so I'm a happy customer and feel 4 stars is a fair review.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Should come with ear plugs for neighborhood 😂
customer_reviews.text: It’s so loud! Sounds like a big remote controlled dune buggy. I wish Razor would make it less noisy because it’s a real cool long board.
customer_reviews.author: vee auto

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product, defective parts
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. It lasted about 1 week and the plastic gears in truck assembly broke, shattered. I now have to deal with Razor to either send me replacement parts. Gear box not sturdy...
customer_reviews.author: Raul D Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to stay ballanced on it!
customer_reviews.text: It has a lot of get up and go!!!! Nice smooth ride!
customer_reviews.author: Randy A.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The skateboard is exactly as advertised. It’s a little bit heavier than I’d expect but there is a motor on it so it explains why. The wheels are nice a wide but they do ride a little bumpy. I wish there were softer wheels on it. I push with my right and my left foot is in front. When riding like this, you have to have the board the opposite way if the logo which is odd because I’m in the majority so idk why they printed the label the wrong way around. Other than that, I’ve had it for a week now and I’m happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler S

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: My Product broke a couple weeks ago. I have been trying to get it repaired but there costumer support team sucks. I have been hung up on twice now. They refuse to listen to me. If you want a cheap product that doesn't last as long and there is no support team there for you go ahead buy it waste the $200.
customer_reviews.author: garrett

customer_reviews.title: Boot leg remote
customer_reviews.text: The board works great when it works and it's loud but I use earbuds so I don't care However last time I rode it it was working fine then when I tried to ride it again the board and controller are ether broken or just refusing to pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginner, very slow and loud
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my order had a bad battery but this review will be based on its performance when it was running fine. It’s a great beginner board, probably for younger kids. It’s slow but that’s to be expected as it is advertised as not that fast. It’s also very loud. Other then that it seemed to do its job for the price. The grip was good and turning was good
customer_reviews.author: The-Boss

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: You're gonna love it for a week. Then you'll get bored by how slow it is. Then your misery will be no more because it will break the next damn week! Save your money and buy a real electric skateboard. The Razer customer support line is laughable on the phone and an email will surely never come back.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Mattson-Fimmers

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My kid is 11 and he loves it! Got on it like it was his longboard and had no trouble learning to ride it! Speed is perfect for him
customer_reviews.author: Tvaz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great purchase if you want a quality yet inexpensive electric skateboard.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: This skateboard is very loud compared to a similar skateboard we own from a different brand. Works as a toy for a kid, but would not recommend for any use other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Let’s Go Royals

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun
customer_reviews.text: Works great however the gear in motor is plastic and broke after 2 weeks.. the return and replace was very easy.. If it breaks again will opt for refund instead of replacement..such a fun board they should make the gear in a metal and also make it so you can foot push if needed
customer_reviews.author: Susan J.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product only worked for a few days then has to be taken to a Razor repair center. It wasn’t fixable so Razor replaced it. Then it worked for 3 days and is broken again. Poor battery life, remote stops working. Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: LISA RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Longboard
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves it! It doesn’t go too fast so it’s a good product for this age he absolutely loves it but it’s winter so he hasn’t been able to ride it for a while we are in Ohio I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend the manufacturer to work on the noice of this skateboard
customer_reviews.text: The product is not bad for the cost, but is extremely noisy which is uncomfortable to enjoy riding it. Battery do not last that long so when you are enjoying it the most you have to stop and charged.
customer_reviews.author: Yaniris

customer_reviews.title: pad product stop working after 1 time use
customer_reviews.text: I'm stil waiting for my refund. it's been like 15 days. they send me a not working bad product
customer_reviews.author: kasper.nissan

customer_reviews.title: Turns easily
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty quick lol be ready. turns easily and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Pursino

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Stop working after a month then starts working agin only to stop. Battery takes way to long to charge and the thing dies pretty fast about 35-45mins of use . Not bad but not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Returned bad product and never got a refund
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work when I recieved it. I returned it and never got reimbursed fir the non functioning board. So I got a bad product and no refund. I am out 200 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: David b.

customer_reviews.title: Great cruising motorized scateboard
customer_reviews.text: Not as fast as their razor motorized scooter but a smooth machine.
customer_reviews.author: RenoJupiter

customer_reviews.title: Not a hill tackler but helps commute
customer_reviews.text: I like the shape flex color design not the weight
customer_reviews.author: antoine

customer_reviews.title: It sounds like a cat dying through a large JBL speaker
customer_reviews.text: Its way too loud and only one wheel is actually motorized, and its really slow.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't light up, Can't use it.
customer_reviews.text: After it is fully charged, I turned on the bored. And nothing. No lights, no remote syncing. Doesn't even turn on at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kisiah

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, unnecessarily loud noise comes out from the board
customer_reviews.text: It makes a loud noise which is kinda distracting and the battery it huge , and it’s slow . I can jog faster than this .
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: No Refund - Faulty Product
customer_reviews.text: Product was faulty and inoperable. Still waiting on my refund over a month later.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Moutes

customer_reviews.title: Battery is very weak
customer_reviews.text: Battery does not hold charge after only riding 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My son loves it! We were surprised how fast it goes!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Battery Not Charging Correctly
customer_reviews.text: I just got it yesterday. After charger over night, I still get the red light, which I assume the battery isn't charged sufficiently. Going to contact Customer Service before I try riding the board. Afraid to ride it without being charged correctly. I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Richman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 15 yr old daughter and she is just in love with it and she says she's the envy of all her friends. I am happy if she is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Hal J Stepanich

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly as intended. My little brother loves it. It's just the right speed.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Tyler Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I purchased this product because I had been looking at skateboard after skateboard trying to find one for a good price. After using this product, I can note that it's top speed makes you feel like you're flying, and the battery life is great. I have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Noah C.

product_meta.title: RazorX Longboard Electric Skateboard
product_meta.description: Give your board a boost with the electric, lithium-ion-powered, longboard skateboard made to zoom! The RazorX Longboard is electrifying the longboard scene, amping up the carve-and-cruise action with an innovative, 125-watt, geared, rear-wheel-drive motor made to go the distance. This complete longboard uses a lithium-ion battery to deliver extra zip for your longboarding fun, hitting speeds up to 10 mph (16 km/h) for up to 40 minutes of continuous use. Get the ride rolling with the variable-speed control on the wireless, digital remote, then hang on for some electrifying cruising action. The 37.5” (952.5 mm) long, 5-ply bamboo deck and custom, reverse kingpin trucks deliver a smooth, responsive ride, while perforated grip tape and ground-gripping urethane wheels keep you firmly in control of your board. Our geared, rear-wheel-drive motor technology is virtually maintenance free, meaning it eliminates alignment issues, chain or belt.
feature_bullets: The RazorX Longboard is powered by a kick-to-start, 125-watt, geared, rear-wheel-drive motor and a lithium-ion battery that delivers an electrifying skateboarding ride at speeds up to 10 mph (16 km/h) for up to 40 minutes of continuous use
The 37.5” (952.5 mm) long deck is made of high-quality, 5-ply bamboo and features perforated grip tape to provide a smooth, controlled ride

The RazorX Longboard comes pre-assembled, so you’re ready to ride this complete longboard electric skateboard right out of the box. Recommended for ages 9 and up; supports riders up to 220 pounds (100 kg)
Includes a wireless (2.4 GHz), digital, hand-held remote with wrist strap (replaceable) and 22V lithium-ion rechargeable and replaceable battery pack

Made to Zoom-Put fun on cruise with the lithium-ion-powered electric skateboard made to zoom! The RazorX Cruiser is a skateboard with an electrifying kick, putting control of a 125-watt, geared motor in the palm of your hand and under your feet.
